original_title: Metallica/Slayer/Megadeth/Anthrax The Big 4 - Sofia, Bulgaria - Behind The Scenes Documentary
overview: Behind-the-scenes documentary that gives you exclusive access to The Big 4 backstage at Sonisphere, including interviews and "Am I Evil?" rehearsal footage.
title: Metallica/Slayer/Megadeth/Anthrax The Big 4 - Sofia, Bulgaria - Behind The Scenes Documentary
